examples.example: 我曾默默暗恋隔壁班的那个阳光男孩，那段时光充满了美好的回忆。

translate.english: I once secretly had a crush on that sunny boy in the next class, and that period of time was filled with beautiful memories.

examples.example: 我一直把那段暗恋藏在心底，它是我青春中最珍贵的秘密。

translate.english: I have always hidden that secret love at the bottom of my heart, and it is the most precious secret in my youth.

examples.example: 我不曾宣之于口的暗恋，也是我人生中一段难忘且美好的经历。

translate.english: The secret love that I have never spoken out is also an unforgettable and beautiful experience in my life.
